strapiEvent.name: Downtown Springdale ART Walk
strapiEvent.description:
From art crawls and comedy shows to vendor fairs and a Monarch Butterfly Parade, Downtown Springdaleâ€™s ART WALK has something for everyone to enjoy on Sep 14-15, from 4-8p, and Sep 16, from 12-6p.

  • The Perfect Start: The three-day festival kicks off Sep 14 with an ART Crawl from 6-8p, including a drink, featured stops along the ART WALK, and artist meet & greets for just $5. Add some laughter to your Thursday night with Comedy Night at the Apollo on Emma, featuring the ART WALK Comedy Troupe. Shows start at 4p and 8p.
  • Take Flight: The Monarch Flight Festival will take place Sep 16 from 12-4p at Turnbow Park. A Monarch Parade at 3p will end with the release of newly hatched butterflies at Shiloh Museum. During the event, shop local vendors and artisans as part of the Emma Exchange at Shiloh Square, beginning at noon. 

Find more ART WALK details HERE.
